arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce 0-0 Genoa: Match Report
arts.sum: In a tense encounter, Lecce and Genoa battled to a goalless draw, with both teams hitting the woodwork but ultimately failing to secure a breakthrough. The match was crucial for both sides, who entered the game separated by just three points and under the guidance of their second coaches of the season. arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce v Genoa: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Lecce's squad have received a potential boost as Filip Marchwinski resumes full training following an injury layoff, ahead of their game against Genoa this afternoon. However, the team still faces several absences, with Mergim Berisha nursing a thigh issue and both Lameck Banda and Kialonda Gaspar confirmed unavailable. arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce v Genoa: Match Preview
arts.sum: As the new year unfolds, Lecce and Genoa find themselves in a critical showdown in Serie A, separated by just three points in the standings. Both teams will be eager to secure a vital victory when they meet at Stadio Via del Mare on Sunday as they aim to distance themselves from the relegation zone. arts.ttl: Former AZ winger Jesper Karlsson loaned to Lecce from Bologna to restart Italian adventure
arts.sum: Former AZ Alkmaar stalwart Jesper Karlsson (26) has signed for Lecce on loan from Bologna for the rest of the season (VI).

arts.ttl: Surprise move: Lecce sign Jesper Karlsson from Bologna
arts.sum: As the transfer window opens, Lecce have made an early statement by securing the signing of Jesper Karlsson from Bologna. The Salento-based club are actively seeking reinforcements to aid their fight for survival in Serie A, and Karlsson has been identified as a key addition to strengthen their attacking options. arts.ttl: “I prefer the team over the individual,” says Vieira ahead of Lecce clash
arts.sum: In his first press conference of 2025, Patrick Vieira, the head coach of Genoa, addressed the media to discuss the upcoming match against Lecce, which marks their second consecutive away game. arts.ttl: Genoa’s transfer activity: Ankeye to Rapid Bucharest, Pereiro attracts Interest
arts.sum: Genoa are actively working to streamline their squad as the January transfer window unfolds.
